casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 30,2014

[Cite as 06/30/2014 Case Announcements #2, 2014-Ohio-2917.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-0853. Broadview Hts. v. Misencik.

Cuyahoga App. No. 100196, 2014-Ohio-1518. Upon consideration of appellant’s expedited motion for *1435stay, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.

Upon consideration of the jurisdictional memoranda filed in this case, the court declines to accept jurisdiction of the appeal pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 7.08(B)(4).
